title: The Body Snatcher (restored, colorized) (1945, horror, imdb score: 7.3)

sources.title: Body Snatchers 1945 Colorized Movie 576p
sources.description: The Body Snatcher is a 1945 American  horror film  directed by  Robert Wise , based on the 1884  short story of the same name  by  Robert Louis Stevenson .  Philip MacDonald  adapted the story for the screen, and producer  Val Lewton , credited as "Carlos Keith", modified MacDonald's screenplay. The film stars  Boris Karloff  as John Gray, a cab driver who moonlights as a  grave robber , and later murderer, to illegally supply Dr. MacFarlane (played by  Henry Daniell ) with cadavers for his classes, and makes mention of  Burke ,  Hare , and  Dr. Knox , in reference to the  West Port murders  of 1828. Alongside Karloff and Daniell, the film's cast includes  Russell Wade ,  Edith Atwater , and  Bela Lugosi . It was the last film in which both Karloff and Lugosi appeared.
